projects.title: CareerPathGPT
projects.cardDescription: AI-powered career guidance with salary prediction and personalized recommendations
projects.description: An AI-powered career guidance system that analyzes resumes, predicts salary ranges, and provides personalized career advice. Built with FastAPI and Streamlit, this full-stack application features intelligent resume parsing, machine learning-based salary prediction, and RAG-powered career recommendations. The system supports both new graduates and working professionals with tailored advice, project recommendations, and GitHub contribution opportunities.
features: Intelligent resume parsing with PDF/DOCX support
ML-powered salary prediction with confidence scores
RAG-based career advice for graduates and professionals
Personalized project recommendations
GitHub contribution opportunities
Interactive chat interface for career questions
Real-time analysis with progress tracking
Docker containerization for easy deployment

projects.title: Multilingual AI Storybook Platform (Team Work)
projects.cardDescription: Collaborative platform for AI-generated multilingual picture books
projects.description: A collaborative platform for AI-generated picture books, designed to support multilingual learning with scalable database design and seamless team integration.
features: Normalized database schema for audio, images, and story data
Efficient content retrieval and scalable storage design
API specification and implementation for front-end and AI integration
Data contracts to standardize communication between teams
Cross-team collaboration workflows for smooth feature deployment
Support for multilingual content and media-rich storytelling

projects.title: Jigsaws Club Digital Management System
projects.cardDescription: Full-stack membership and rental management system with AWS deployment
projects.description: A full-stack membership and rental management system developed at National Taiwan University, built with NodeJS and MySQL, and deployed on AWS. Features rental tracking, access control, and intelligent search with SQL + OpenSearch.
features: Membership portal with account management
Rental tracking and overdue notifications (AWS CloudWatch scheduler)
Image upload and tagging (AWS S3 integration)
Access control for members and admins
Advanced search using SQL + OpenSearch
Scalable deployment on AWS

projects.title: Beat Drop
projects.cardDescription: Simple rhythm game built with vanilla JavaScript
